Histogram

public Histogram(PixelDepth type,
                 int[] intensities,
                 int[] frequencies,
                 int minValue,
                 int maxValue,
                 int maxFreq)
captures the intensity distribution of pixel-array

Parameters:
type - type of the image
intensities - intensity values
frequencies - frequencies for corresponding intensity values
minValue - maximum intensity value
maxValue - minimum intensity value
maxFreq - maximum frequency

Creates a buffered image with the specified dimension drawing the histogram within the given range

Parameters:
size - the size of the required image
lower - the lower cutoff intensity, can be null
upper - the upper cutoff intensity, can be null
